meta.title: Professional Golang Developer | Go API & Microservices Development
meta.description: Hire an expert Golang developer with 8+ years experience building high-performance APIs, microservices, and backend systems. Specializing in Go, gRPC, GraphQL, and cloud-native development.

hero.title: Professional Golang Development Services
hero.subtitle: Expert Golang developer with 8+ years building high-performance, scalable backend systems. Specializing in Go APIs, microservices, and enterprise-grade applications.

intro.title: What is Golang Development?
intro.p1: Golang (Go) is a powerful programming language developed by Google, designed for building fast, reliable, and efficient software. As an experienced Golang developer, I leverage Go's concurrency features, simplicity, and performance to create backend systems that scale effortlessly.
intro.p2: Whether you need a Go API developer for REST or GraphQL services, a microservices architect, or someone to optimize your existing Go codebase, I provide full-stack Golang development services tailored to your business needs.

api.title: Golang API Development
api.desc: Build high-performance REST and GraphQL APIs with Go. Optimized for speed, security, and scalability. Perfect for SaaS platforms and enterprise applications.

microservices.title: Microservices Architecture
microservices.desc: Design and implement microservices using Golang. Containerized with Docker, orchestrated with Kubernetes, and built for cloud-native environments.

optimization.title: Performance Optimization
optimization.desc: Optimize existing Go applications for better performance. Profiling, refactoring, and implementing best practices to reduce latency and increase throughput.

why.title: Why Hire Me as Your Golang Developer?
why.experience: 8+ Years Experience: Proven track record with Fortune 500 companies including NBCUniversal, Kyndryl, and Wind River.
why.code: Production-Ready Code: Write clean, maintainable Go code following industry best practices.
why.performance: Performance-Focused: Achieved 70% performance improvements in enterprise systems.
why.fullstack: Full-Stack Expertise: Can handle both Golang backend and Nuxt/Vue frontend development.

q1.q: Why choose Golang for backend development?
q1.a: Golang offers exceptional performance, built-in concurrency, fast compilation, and excellent standard library. It's ideal for building scalable APIs, microservices, and cloud-native applications that need to handle high traffic.

q2.q: How long does it take to develop a Go API?
q2.a: A standard REST API takes 2-3 weeks. Complex GraphQL APIs or microservices architectures may take 4-8 weeks depending on requirements, integrations, and infrastructure setup.

q3.q: Do you provide ongoing Golang support?
q3.a: Yes, I offer maintenance, bug fixes, performance optimization, and feature additions for existing Golang applications. Available for both hourly consulting and retainer agreements.

cta.title: Ready to Build with Golang?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss your project and how I can help you build a high-performance Go application.

meta.title: Landing Page Development | High-Converting Nuxt/Vue Landing Pages
meta.description: Professional landing page development services. I build fast, conversion-optimized landing pages with Nuxt/Vue for SaaS, products, and lead generation. Get 95+ PageSpeed scores.

hero.title: Landing Page Development That Converts
hero.subtitle: Professional landing page developer specializing in high-converting, lightning-fast pages built with Nuxt/Vue. Turn visitors into customers with optimized landing page design.

intro.title: What is Landing Page Development?
intro.p1: Landing page development is the process of creating focused, conversion-optimized web pages designed to drive specific actionsâ€”whether that's capturing leads, promoting a product, or driving sign-ups. As a specialized landing page developer, I build pages that combine compelling design with technical excellence.
intro.p2: Using modern frameworks like Nuxt.js and Vue.js, I create landing pages that load instantly, rank well in search engines, and convert visitors at industry-leading rates. Every landing page is mobile-first, accessibility-compliant, and optimized for Core Web Vitals.

saas.title: SaaS Landing Pages
saas.desc: Custom landing pages for SaaS products focused on conversion optimization. Includes hero sections, feature highlights, pricing tables, and sign-up forms.

leadgen.title: Lead Generation Pages
leadgen.desc: High-converting landing pages designed to capture qualified leads. Optimized forms, compelling CTAs, and integrated with your CRM or email marketing tools.

product.title: Product Launch Pages
product.desc: Eye-catching landing pages for product launches. Countdown timers, waitlist sign-ups, early bird offers, and social proof elements to maximize buzz.

why.title: Why Choose My Landing Page Development?

performance.title: Lightning Fast Performance
performance.desc: Every landing page scores 95+ on Google PageSpeed. Fast loading times mean better conversion rates and higher search rankings.

conversion.title: Conversion-Optimized
conversion.desc: Strategic placement of CTAs, persuasive copywriting structure, social proof integration, and A/B testing recommendations to maximize conversions.

mobile.title: Mobile-First Design
mobile.desc: 70% of traffic comes from mobile. Every landing page is designed and optimized for mobile users first, then enhanced for desktop.

seo.title: SEO-Ready
seo.desc: Built with SEO best practices: semantic HTML, structured data, optimized meta tags, and perfect Core Web Vitals scores for better search visibility.

features.title: What's Included in Every Landing Page

step1.title: Discovery
step1.desc: Understand your goals, target audience, and conversion objectives

step2.title: Design
step2.desc: Create wireframes and mockups optimized for conversions

step3.title: Development

q1.q: How much does landing page development cost?
q1.a: Landing page development typically ranges from $1,500-$5,000 depending on complexity, custom features, and integrations. Contact me for a detailed quote based on your needs.

q2.q: How long does it take to build a landing page?
q2.a: Standard landing pages take 1-2 weeks from design to launch. Complex pages with custom animations, integrations, or advanced features may take 2-4 weeks.

q3.q: Can you integrate my landing page with my CRM/email marketing?
q3.a: Yes! I integrate landing pages with popular tools like HubSpot, Mailchimp, ConvertKit, Salesforce, and custom APIs. Form submissions can be sent directly to your existing systems.

q4.q: Will my landing page be mobile-friendly?
q4.a: Absolutely. Every landing page is built mobile-first and tested across all devices and screen sizes to ensure perfect rendering and optimal conversion rates.

cta.title: Ready to Build a High-Converting Landing Page?
cta.subtitle: Let's create a landing page that drives results for your business.
